metadata.name: Local Accounts Discovery
metadata.comment: Local accounts, System Owner/User discovery using operating systems utilities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /c')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dir ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\')) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' rmdir ')) OR (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\net.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\net1.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('user')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/domain')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/add')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/delete')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/active')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/expires')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/passwordreq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/scriptpath')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/times')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/workstations'))) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\whoami.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\quser.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\qwinsta.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wmic.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('useraccount')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmdkey.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /l'))))

output.summary: Local accounts, System Owner/User discovery using operating systems utilities

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administrator or user enumerates local users for legitimate reason Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1033/T1033.md
